bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.painter

Interface FeaturePainter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FeatureArrowNeedlePainter, FeatureArrowPainter, FeatureBoxPainter, FeatureLinePainter, FeatureMeterBoxPainter, FeatureNeedlePainter, FeatureOvalPainter, FeaturePainterBase, FeatureTrianglePainter, ImagePainter

    public interface FeaturePainter
    This interface defines a feature painter.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this painter.
      Object getUserData()
      Gets the user data object.
      void paintFeature(Graphics2D g, Rectangle box, FGraphics fg, int strand)
      Paint a single feature.
      void setUserData(Object userData)
      Sets a particular user data object to this painter.

    • Method Detail

      • paintFeature

        void paintFeature(Graphics2D g,
                Rectangle box,
                FGraphics fg,
                int strand)
        Paint a single feature.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object
        box - the rectangle that contains the feature to draw.
        fg - a feature graphics object
        strand - the strand orientation. Value is one of Feature.XXX_STRAND.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this painter.

      • setUserData

        void setUserData(Object userData)
        Sets a particular user data object to this painter.

      • getUserData

        Object getUserData()
        Gets the user data object. Can be null.
